alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 11:07AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern White Pine and southeastern Elko Counties through 1145 AM PDT... At 1104 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Currie, Cherry Creek, Ruby Lake, Harrison Pass, Overland Pass, Franklin Lake and Big Bald Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County
